1.title: Berlin
1.plot: Most of the U.S. American population is of European ancestry. Yet the American public does not know a lot about the Europe. Maybe a little about the country of their forefathers. In the 21st century with it's new Endeavors it will be imported for the Americans to know a little bit more about the new melting pot on the other side of the Atlantic ocean. Europe's peoples with it's drastic changes, the life, the culture, the ups and downs of a Union of 27 nations with it's 500 million people. imdb.plot outline: Europe Beat - the 12 largest cities in the EU. A documentary series of 12 episodes. Most of the U.S. American population is of European ancestry. Yet the American public does not know a lot about the Europe. Maybe a little about the country of their forefathers. In the 21st century with it's new Endeavors, maybe it will be imported for the Americans to know a little bit more about the new melting pot on the other side of the Atlantic ocean. Europe's peoples with it, it's drastic changes, the life, the culture, the ups and downs of a Union of 27 nations with it's 500 million people. Some of them being U.S. Americans who live over here in Europe. Europe is not just another pretty face. It's a powerful global player as well as a pretty site. We will show you 12 European cities with their history and present life. According to Wikipedia, the 12 largest cities in the EU by population are - London, Berlin, Madrid, Rome, Paris, Hamburg, Vienna, Budapest, Warsaw, Bucharest, Barcelona and Munich. Europe, what do we really know about our confederation Europe? How's life in the big cities in Europe? In the turmoil of the early 21st Century Europe is still strange to us, 27 countries with 23 official languages and over 500 million people. A huge number of people from different Couleurs. We visit 3 US citizens living in these towns and observe their life in the chosen home and you ask the same questions, 10 questions to people living in the portrayed city. Likewise, we ask these questions to the US ambassador or consul of the selected city.
imdb.title: Europe Beat

Yet the American public does not know a lot about the Europe. Maybe a little about the country of their forefathers. In the 21st century with it's new Endeavors, maybe it will be imported for the Americans to know a little bit more about the new melting pot on the other side of the Atlantic ocean. Some of them being U.S. Americans who live over here in Europe. Europe is not just another pretty face. It's a powerful global player as well as a pretty site. We will show you 12 European cities with their history and present life. According to Wikipedia, the 12 largest cities in the EU by population are - London, Berlin, Madrid, Rome, Paris, Hamburg, Vienna, Budapest, Warsaw, Bucharest, Barcelona and Munich. Europe, what do we really know about our confederation Europe? How's life in the big cities in Europe? In the turmoil of the early 21st Century Europe is still strange to us, 27 countries with 23 official languages and over 500 million people. A huge number of people from different Couleurs. We visit 3 US citizens living in these towns and observe their life in the chosen home and you ask the same questions, 10 questions to people living in the portrayed city.
